chadcommit.prompt:
Analyze a git diff and make a short conventional and funny commit message, follow this template: 🚀feat(scope) [message]
🛠️refactor(scope) [message]
⚙️chore(scope) [message]; Response example: 🚀feat(player) add captions
🛠️refactor(player) support new formats
⚙️chore(dependencies) upgrade terser to 5.16.6
